name: Wakelite INC.
overview:
“NanoPad - ready to hand â€“ anything, anytime…”

Throughout the years we have been surrounding ourselves with several digital gadgets. If we are lucky the phone, navigation and an MP3 player is squeezed into one device but many times we realize that we cannot look out of the windshield due to the mobile phone, navigation and other device holders. The antiskid pads do not provide a full solution, as when taking a tight curve if something starts to fly around from the windshield that lands either at the footwell or, if the windows are pulled down, outside the car somewhere causing an accident. In case of a sailing boat or a motorboat the fixing of certain devices inside or outside the ship is crucial. The Nano-Pad offers a solution for the above mentioned problem. Using vacuum technology it sticks on the dashboard and the devices you put on it are fixed safe just by a simple hand movement, without having to do any montage. You just put the device on the pad and ready. The Nano-Pad is 14,5cm (5,71 in) long and 8cm (3,15 in) wide and with its compact size it can be used to safely fix a mobile phone, headset, iPod, sunglasses, PDA, navigation devices, cigarettes, lighter, paper, pen, mp3 player, paper tissues, parking ticket, season ticket and many other objects. The Nano-Pad is non-magnetic, glue-free, its technology is based on a surface structure that creates vacuum. The product is produced by the German company, INOTEC, originally it was developed for space travel. It is easy to keep clean by simply washing it with water and perhaps some wash liquid. The original adhesiveness is fully restored after cleaning.
